body.name: Ross-Simons Good Fortune Jade Bracelet in 18kt Gold Over Sterling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 39 mins.
features: MULTICOLORED JADE AND 18KT GOLD OVER STERLING — Multicolored jade "good fortune" bracelet in 18kt yellow gold over sterling silver. 16x8mm white, green, black, yellow and red carved jade. Polished finish. 7 1/2 in. long. 1/4 in. wide. Figure 8 safety. Box clasp features the Chinese symbol for "good fortune."
THE FINISHING TOUCH — With its meaningful design, this multicolored jade bracelet adds a feminine accent to any style. Pair it with your casual or formal attire.

ROSS-SIMONS QUALITY — Treat yourself to the luxury of Ross-Simons fine jewelry. Whether your selection is made of 14kt gold, 18kt gold or gorgeous sterling silver, our jewelry always makes a lasting statement.

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR HER — This is the ideal gift for your sister, daughter, mom, wife, niece, aunt, best friend, girlfriend — or yourself! Whether she prefers modern or traditional jewelry, Ross-Simons has a wide selection of bracelets, earrings, necklaces and rings to choose from.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED — Ross-Simons jewelry arrives beautifully packaged in a gift box, ready to delight for any occasion, including birthdays, Christmas, Mother’s Day, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day, weddings, graduations and much more! Due to the naturally occurring characteristics of gemstones, each is unique and may exhibit imperfections such as inclusions , blemishes and cloudiness, as well as color variations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ross-Simons Jewelry As a premier retail fine jeweler, we have consistently delivered exceptional quality, value and service for over 70 years. Our long-standing mission remains unchanged: to make elegant and beautiful jewelry affordable for you.

Ross-Simons: Our Brands We truly have something for everyone. Explore our family of brands and find the perfect jewelry to suit your style and budget. Ross-Simons: Your Story Every piece of jewelry tells a story. With so many fabulous styles at amazing prices, we’re excited to help you tell yours. Ross-Simons Jewelry Styling Tips Jewelry is about having fun! Create your look with classic pieces, on-trend styles, best-selling basics, traditional favorites, handmade exclusives and more. Ross-Simons: Our History For over 70 years, we’ve proudly sourced beautiful fine jewelry from around the globe and delivered it direct to your door.

Previous page Ross-Simons Jewelry From classic looks to the latest trends, we offer a vast selection of high-quality jewelry styles Bracelets Best-selling links, perfect-fit bolos, stack-ready bangles, gorgeous gemstone and diamond bracelets Earrings Explore our earring collection for hoops, drops, studs, chandeliers, climbers, threaders and more. Necklaces Pretty pendants, classic chains, slinky links, layerable styles. Rings Cocktail rings, fashion rings, eternity bands, stackable bands and more. Next page 1 Ross-Simons Jewelry 2 Bracelets 3 Earrings 4 Necklaces 5 Rings

Previous page Lab Grown Diamonds Our lab-grown diamonds have the same brilliance, hardness and durability as mined diamonds. Diamonds Our quality diamonds are expertly sourced to meet our exceptional standards. Gold We use only high-quality, real gold for our rich 14kt and 18kt gold fine jewelry designs. Gemstones Our gemstones are ethically mined and carefully selected for rarity, quality and natural beauty. Next page 1 Lab Grown Diamonds 2 Diamonds 3 Gold 4 Gemstones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Jade Bracelet
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this jade bracelet for my sister-in-law. She thought it was lovely, but it is too small for her. I explained how to exchange it for something else on Amazon. As far as I know, she hasn't done anything to exchange the bracelet. I cannot rate the comfort of the bracelet because she is unable to wear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The bracelet is beautiful but I snapped how to glue it back
reviews.reviewText: The bracelet is beautiful I love it but I justWant to know replacement because it snappedI had to superglue it back together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pink Jade bracelet
reviews.reviewText: Latch doesn’t work. Need to use safety pieces. Didn’t want to go thru returning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Did you even know jade came in colors other than green? I got this for my wife for our jade anniversary and it's lovely. Nicely made and a bit unusual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just as pretty and comfortable to wear as pictured. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken stone links
reviews.reviewText: Really like the color of the stones and the bracelet is beautiful. However, quality is very poor. The second time I wore it two stones disconnected from the anchors. The security clasp is strong but the stones are not secure. I have super glued at least four of the stones and can’t wear this as the bracelet falls off once the stone is loose. Contacted seller and they told me they can’t help me because it’s outside of a thirty day window and I should have purchased a warranty. Definitely won’t repurchase from them as you assume the bracelet should at least be wearable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and ever elegant
reviews.reviewText: I Love this and gifted it to my daughter after giving birth to my grandson. It is lovely and I will get another for my other daughter . Thank you
